mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wright, Horatio G.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov F.H. Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling May 9 1862. By Telegraph from Cincinnati, 24 1862. I have not a man to speak from my command for western Virginia I have requested Genl Halleck to send troops there & he promises to do so H.G. Wright Maj Genl Comdg 28Hq188[crossed out] 122pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Wright, Horatio G.
Cincinnati, Ohio
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
